func:
msg.topic = "Select * From detectionProbability where " +
            "loc = " + msg.query.loc + " AND " +
            "pro = " + msg.query.pro + " AND " +
            "time < " + msg.query.end + " AND " +
            "time > " + msg.query.start
return msg;

name: set query
func:
msg.topic = "REPLACE into profiles (loc, pro, shadow, data) " +
    "values (" +
    msg.payload.loc + ", " +
    msg.payload.pro + ", " +
    msg.payload.shadow + ", " +
    JSON.stringify(msg.payload.data).replace(/\\"/g, "/") + ")";


return msg

name: set query
func:
msg.topic = "Select data From profiles where " + 
                "loc = " + msg.payload.loc + " AND " +
                "pro = " + msg.payload.pro + " AND " + 
                "shadow = " + msg.payload.shadow
return msg;

name: Create
func:
msg.payload = "CREATE TABLE profiles(" +
    "loc INT NOT NULL, " +
    "pro INT NOT NULL, " +
    "shadow INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, " +
    "data text not null " +
    ")"

return msg;

name: Drop
func:
msg.payload = "drop table profiles"

return msg;

name: format output

func:
msg.payload = "success"
return msg;
